Application is divided into four sections - Shopping List, Recipes List, Calendar and Help. You can access navigation menu by tapping the icon in the upper-left corner of the screen.\n\nStart by adding your recipes to the Recipes List. Then, use Calendar to assign meals for upcoming days. Finally, generate your interactive Shopping List for desired number of days.

Recipes List contains every recipe you added so far. Your recipes list will be initially empty.

Tap "New" to create a new recipe. Then, type the name, add all the ingredients and save it. Try to put here every recipe you know and use!

When you are ready to plan you meals, head to the Calendar section.

In Calendar section you can plan your meals for any day, and then automatically generate the shopping list, without worrying about looking up the ingredients.\n\nTap any day to access menu which lets you assign any recipe to this day.

When you already assigned recipes to the days, you can generate the shopping list.

Tap the "Select Days For List" option in upper-right corner of the screen. Now, set the period of time to generate shopping list for, by tapping the first and then last day of this period. Then, tap "Generate List" (upper-right corner of the screen).

It is done! Just navigate back to Shopping List section to see your shopping list.

Shopping list has two modes - shopping mode (turned on by default) and edit mode.

Shopping mode is designed as an interactive version of traditional shopping list. Tapping at item makes it "checked" - it will instantly appear grayed out and moved to the bottom of the list, so you can clearly see what is left to get.

Tap the items as you put them in your shopping cart!

While you are still on Shopping List screen, tap the "Shopping Mode OFF" option in upper-right corner to enter Edit mode.
Now, you can edit any item by tapping it.

To go back to the Shopping Mode, tap "Shopping Mode ON" option, again in upper-right corner of the screen.

You can always delete any recipe (on Recipes List screen) or shopping item (on Shopping List screen) by pressing the item and holding for a while.\n\nSelect the items you want to delete, then press "Delete".
